short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See who is online right now among your friends at Gaia Online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
So you have this important thing to do, but your friends told you to reunite "tonight" for a fun night at zOMG! But when will you go there? As soon as you enter, you know you can kiss goodbye your important thing, but how do you now they are inside now? Well, this extension will tell you now when your friends log into Gaia Online for some fun all together!

OPTIONS:
-Where do you want to go? The main page? To the forums? Directly to zOMG!? You decide where to go in Gaia Online when clicking on the badge!
-Are there here yet? Or you don't want to stalk that much? Select how frequently you want the extension to check your new online friends.
-Display desktop notifications for your online friends! Now you can't say no one told you he got just online!

Questions? Suggestions? Problems? Contact the developer at ext@vanadi.us
